title: NYC: Get Vaxx'd or GTFOH, The Weekend = Sober Lite? 8.4.21
itunes:title: NYC: Get Vaxx'd or GTFOH, The Weekend = Sober Lite? 8.4.21
description:
In episode 965, Miles and guest co-host Blair Socci are joined by comedian Jono Zalay to discuss NYC mandating vaccines, Rudy Giuliani needing new friends, the mess that is Spirit Airlines, The Weeknd wants to feel his face and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. NY Mandating Vaccines
  2. Giuliani Needs Friends
  3. Spirit Airlines an ACTUAL SHIT SHOW
  4. Listen: Durand Jones & The Indications - Witchoo
